query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'user_credentials';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2eJNWYGY92vZU3w.root --database TyeFpW5ykZHTuZXuk6iMG7 --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'user_credentials';
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME
id
user_id
username
password_hash
password_changed_at
failed_login_attempts
locked_until
created_at
updated_at
